amendment.description: To require the Director to conduct a study on the impact, effectiveness, and feasibility of amending section 1361 of the National Flood Insurance Act of 1968 to include widely used and nationally recognized building codes as part of the floodplain management criteria developed under such section.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4711 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4711 proposed by Senator DeMint to Amendment SA 4707.
